languages.text: "Господин Ульфар... Со всем уважением к вам и вашему ордену прошу — закройте рот. Сейчас я менее всего нуждаюсь в вашем скепсисе".
"Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
languages.original_text: "Господин Ульфар... Со всем уважением к вам и вашему ордену прошу — закройте рот. Сейчас я менее всего нуждаюсь в вашем скепсисе".

traits.locale_text: "Master Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, I ask you to shut your mouth. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, I ask you to shut your mouth. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “乌尔法大人……出于对你和你的战团的敬意，我希望你能把嘴闭上。我现在最不需要的，就是你的怀疑态度。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: “乌尔法大人……出于对你和你的战团的敬意，我希望你能把嘴闭上。我现在最不需要的，就是你的怀疑态度。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ウルファー様…お言葉を返すようですが、口は謹んだ方がよろしいでしょう。その懐疑的な態度は、今は全く不要なものです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: 「ウルファー様…お言葉を返すようですが、口は謹んだ方がよろしいでしょう。その懐疑的な態度は、今は全く不要なものです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Seigneur Ulfar... Sans vouloir manquer de respect à votre chapitre ou à vous, fermez-la. Je me passerai très bien de votre scepticisme. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: « Seigneur Ulfar... Sans vouloir manquer de respect à votre chapitre ou à vous, fermez-la. Je me passerai très bien de votre scepticisme. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Señor Ulfar... Con el debido respeto a usted y a su Capítulo, cierre el pico. Su escepticismo es lo último que necesitamos ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: «Señor Ulfar... Con el debido respeto a usted y a su Capítulo, cierre el pico. Su escepticismo es lo último que necesitamos ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Ulfar ... Bei allem Respekt vor Euch und Eurem Orden ... haltet den Mund. Eure Skepsis ist das Letzte, was wir im Moment brauchen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar ... Bei allem Respekt vor Euch und Eurem Orden ... haltet den Mund. Eure Skepsis ist das Letzte, was wir im Moment brauchen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Ulfar. Sana ve Tümenine saygım sonsuz ancak lütfen sus... Kuşkuculuğun, şu an ihtiyacım olan son şey."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar... With all due respect to you and your Chapter, keep your mouth shut. Your scepticism is the last thing I need right now."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar. Sana ve Tümen'ine saygım sonsuz ama çeneni kapalı tut. Kuşkuculuğun şu an ihtiyacım olan son şey."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
